documents.document: @iiNet @iiDarryn Yay! service cancelled! goodbye!
@iiNet @iiDarryn apparently I have to be a network technician and perform a bunch of tests to get my internet that YOU provide me, fixed.
@iiNet @iiDarryn got through to customer service, said they can't help. If that's the case i want my money back, and no cancellation fees.
@iiNet @iiDarryn this happens everyday between 6pm and 11pm but does also happen at other times of day.
@iiNet @iiDarryn the latency can last for minutes at a time during which almost all websites and online services do not work at all.
@iiNet @iiDarryn between https://t.co/NjTSsPjtiT and https://t.co/cWIQCYNQH7 there is a frequent periodic latency spike of up to 4 seconds.
@iiNet @iiDarryn Fix my internet please. I'll post a screenshot of a trace route that shows you exactly where the pâ€¦ https://t.co/jjlRxWlo1g
@UBET No one wins from gambling.
@iiNet @iiDarryn Nope, still no call back. I tried calling again but was on hold for almost 2 hours and gave up.
@iselect I don't think further investigation is needed. iiNet don't pick up the phone, they are unreachable. You should never recommend them
@iselect I'm very unhappy with you recommending me @iinet. They have been nothing but terrible in every way.
@iiNet Customer Service said they would call me back and they never did. Continues to be worst ISP ever.
@iiNet continues to be the worst ISP I've ever had. I'm changing. Anyone know who's good in West Melbourne? https://t.co/jUPHqU1DyK

@iinet I pay for 25Mbits. I only get 4Mbits mostly and cut outs constantly. I have fibre to the door, no wifi... What am I paying for?
